title: bhErikai kETTu
sahitya:
bhErikai kETTu vandEn arasE nI periya dharuma durai ariya udAran enum


anupallavi

  Aruyir yAvirkkum paDi aLakkum durai en panjam tavirppAn enrE nenjil urudi koNDu


caraNam    bhattip-paradEshiyAi shuTrit-tirindu shivap-pittu piDitturakkak-katti katti alauttE
shaddam aDangi manam cittattilE oDungi mutti peralAm enrE iddinam un jaya
